amendment.description: Amendment sought to add a new section detailing modifications of real property standard deduction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section detailing modifications of real property standard deduction.

action.text: Mrs. Biggert raised a point of order against the Holt amendment (A009). Mrs. Biggert stated that the amendment was not germane and violated clause 7 of rule 16. The Chair sustained the point of order.
